reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a one night stay here - 2 queen bed room, good sized clean room. Very comfortable beds. Nice 32inch flat screen TV, but no fridge. Fairly new motel, could hear tv's from rooms either side of us. (so either they were turned up loud or the walls might be abit thin) Good assortment of eats for breakfast.
reviews.title: good overnight stay

reviews.text: Theres a Walmart and Albersons across the road.
reviews.title: Just perfect (travel agent review)

reviews.text: This is a newly-opened fairfield inn in the quite city of Gillette. I'm a travel agent so I've visited hundreds of locations around the world, and I have to say that this is one of the best medium rate hotels I've ever went to.
reviews.title: Good Stop-Over

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Perfect american-asian decor, impeccable cleanliness. I would recomend this property to all my clients and, above all, to all my best friends.
reviews.title: So Much More Than We Expected!

reviews.text: The best Fairfield property I've stayed at to date, likely what the chain's executives would want a guest to take away from the interior and rooms. Makes you wish that the chain's large-city properties were similarly appointed.
reviews.title: A showcase property for Fairfield?

reviews.text: The new waterpark was running at full water flow ... maybe too fast for the little ones to enjoy fully.
reviews.title: Beware of double charges!

reviews.text: Room was okay, water park was nice, but like most Gillette hotels, the staff was rude and horrible. We repeatedly told the clerk that we were paying in cash, but she charged the Visa card we had used to secure the room. We were told we'd get the money back the same day, but 3 days later we still do not have our money back, over $360! So now we have overdraft fees and a bad taste in our mouths. We will not be staying here again, and since the staff was rude and acknowledged that they don't care about this, we even called corporate. They said it was in the hands of the local hotel and they would not do anything to help. Even had the nerve to say, "Hope you stay with Marriott soon!" Right. Those reservations are cancelled!
reviews.title: Nice, Neat and Lots of Fun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The decor of this hotels was just plain fun. Very trendy, chic and comfortable. The hotel staff was very helpful. The lobby was small but loaded with everything we needed, above average breakfast, good coffee, and business center very user friendly for us to print our boarding passes. The neat thing about this hotel was its inside water park. What a great place for our kids to bring their little ones while daddy is working. They even allow local families access to rent the water park for parties. We travel back to WY every couple years and we will be staying here again.
reviews.title: A Waterpark Hotel

reviews.text: If you're a family with kids, you might enjoy this place but as a couple looking for just a nice, QUIET place to stay, we won't be back. Kids on our floor were using the hotel as their "playroom", running around in their swim suits, getting the elevator greasy and dirty with their popcorn, etc. Hotel staff didn't seem to care.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
